title: Chicken Salad
steps: Cover chicken with salted water. Bring to boil, reduce to simmer. Cook until 160°F, 15-20 minutes.
Cool 10 minutes, then shred or chop.
Add chicken, celery, parsley, shallot. Toss.
Season with salt and pepper. Chill 30 minutes.
Serve on bread, in lettuce cups, or with crackers.
notes: Shredded has better texture than cubed.
